message.body: Mleh, not too aweful. I just couldn't fall asleep till like 4:30 last night.
Yeah. Ill send you my notes :) you coming to lunch? I'm on the 11:30 bus so ill be there soon
That would be great, thanks. I still have to take a shower, so might not catch you for lunch.
Ok. Ill be there til 12:30 probably
Is there any chance you could bring me back a bowl of apple sauce? I don't really feel like I can eat more than that right now...
